languages.text: {n}Едкий напиток обжигает глотку, и тут же туман заволакивает ваш взор. Небо темнеет, поднявшийся ветер свистит в ушах. Сквозь него прорывается надсадное карканье птицы. Ульфар одобрительно кивает:{/n} "Это знак — судьба шагает подле нас. Скъял!" {n}Вернув себе рог, Волк делает богатырский глоток.{/n}

{n}The astringent liquid burns your throat, and a fog immediately descends over your vision. The sky darkens, and the rising wind whistles in your ears. Through it comes the high-pitched cawing of a bird. Ulfar nods approvingly.{/n} "It is a sign — fate walks beside us. Skal!" {n}Taking back his horn, the Wolf takes a mighty swallow of the stuff.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Едкий напиток обжигает глотку, и тут же туман заволакивает ваш взор. Небо темнеет, поднявшийся ветер свистит в ушах. Сквозь него прорывается надсадное карканье птицы. Ульфар одобрительно кивает:{/n} "Это знак — судьба шагает подле нас. Скал!" {n}Вернув себе рог, Волк делает богатырский глоток.{/n}

languages.text: {n}充满刺激性的液体灼烧着你的喉咙，雾气立刻遮住了你的视线。天空变得昏暗，狂风开始在你耳边呼啸，风中传来了高亢的鸟叫声。乌尔法赞许地点点头。{/n}“这是个好兆头，命运站在我们这边。干杯！”{n}乌尔法拿回了他的角杯，猛地喝了一大口。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The astringent liquid burns your throat, and a fog immediately descends over your vision. The sky darkens, and the rising wind whistles in your ears. Through it comes the high-pitched cawing of a bird. Ulfar nods approvingly.{/n} "It is a sign — fate walks beside us. Skal!" {n}Taking back his horn, the Wolf takes a mighty swallow of the stuff.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}充满刺激性的液体灼烧着你的喉咙，雾气立刻遮住了你的视线。天空变得昏暗，狂风开始在你耳边呼啸，风中传来了高亢的鸟叫声。乌尔法赞许地点点头。{/n}“这是个好兆头，命运站在我们这边。干杯！”{n}乌尔法拿回了他的角杯，猛地喝了一大口。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}渋い液体があなたの喉を焼くと、すぐに視界を霧が覆う。空は暗くなり、強くなる風の音が耳に届く。鳥の甲高い鳴き声が聞こえてくる。ウルファーは満足げにうなずく。{/n}「こいつは印だ。運命が俺らと共に歩いてくれる。乾杯！」{n}角笛を受け取ると、狼は中身を力強く飲み干す。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The astringent liquid burns your throat, and a fog immediately descends over your vision. The sky darkens, and the rising wind whistles in your ears. Through it comes the high-pitched cawing of a bird. Ulfar nods approvingly.{/n} "It is a sign — fate walks beside us. Skal!" {n}Taking back his horn, the Wolf takes a mighty swallow of the stuff.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}渋い液体があなたの喉を焼くと、すぐに視界を霧が覆う。空は暗くなり、強くなる風の音が耳に届く。鳥の甲高い鳴き声が聞こえてくる。ウルファーは満足げにうなずく。{/n}「こいつは印だ。運命が俺らと共に歩いてくれる。乾杯！」{n}角笛を受け取ると、狼は中身を力強く飲み干す。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}El líquido astringente te quema la garganta y tu vista se nubla al momento. El cielo se oscurece y un viento cada vez más intenso silba en tus oídos. A través del rugido del viento, escuchas el agudo graznido de un pájaro. Ulfar asiente con aprobación.{/n} «Es una buena señal. El destino nos acompaña. ¡Skal!». {n}El Lobo recupera su cuerno y da un gran trago del mejunje.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The astringent liquid burns your throat, and a fog immediately descends over your vision. The sky darkens, and the rising wind whistles in your ears. Through it comes the high-pitched cawing of a bird. Ulfar nods approvingly.{/n} "It is a sign — fate walks beside us. Skal!" {n}Taking back his horn, the Wolf takes a mighty swallow of the stuff.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El líquido astringente te quema la garganta y tu vista se nubla al momento. El cielo se oscurece y un viento cada vez más intenso silba en tus oídos. A través del rugido del viento, escuchas el agudo graznido de un pájaro. Ulfar asiente con aprobación.{/n} «Es una buena señal. El destino nos acompaña. ¡Skal!». {n}El Lobo recupera su cuerno y da un gran trago del mejunje.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le liquide astringent vous brûle la gorge et un voile obscurcit immédiatement votre vision. Le ciel s'assombrit tandis qu'un vent soudain siffle à vos oreilles et vous apporte le croassement aigu d'un oiseau. Ulfar approuve d'un signe de tête.{/n} « C'est un signe... Le destin marche à nos côtés. Skal ! » {n}Le Loup reprend sa corne et avale une longue gorgée de son contenu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The astringent liquid burns your throat, and a fog immediately descends over your vision. The sky darkens, and the rising wind whistles in your ears. Through it comes the high-pitched cawing of a bird. Ulfar nods approvingly.{/n} "It is a sign — fate walks beside us. Skal!" {n}Taking back his horn, the Wolf takes a mighty swallow of the stuff.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le liquide astringent vous brûle la gorge et un voile obscurcit immédiatement votre vision. Le ciel s'assombrit tandis qu'un vent soudain siffle à vos oreilles et vous apporte le croassement aigu d'un oiseau. Ulfar approuve d'un signe de tête.{/n} « C'est un signe... Le destin marche à nos côtés. Skal ! » {n}Le Loup reprend sa corne et avale une longue gorgée de son contenu.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Die herbe Flüssigkeit verbrennt dir die Kehle, und sofort legt sich ein Nebel über deine Sicht. Der Himmel verdunkelt sich, und der aufziehende Wind pfeift in deinen Ohren. Dazwischen ertönt das hohe Krächzen eines Vogels. Ulfar nickt wohlwollend.{/n} "Das ist ein Zeichen – das Schicksal begleitet uns. Skal!" {n}Der Wolf erhält sein Horn wieder zurück und nimmt einen gewaltigen Schluck.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The astringent liquid burns your throat, and a fog immediately descends over your vision. The sky darkens, and the rising wind whistles in your ears. Through it comes the high-pitched cawing of a bird. Ulfar nods approvingly.{/n} "It is a sign — fate walks beside us. Skal!" {n}Taking back his horn, the Wolf takes a mighty swallow of the stuff.{/n}

Dazwischen ertönt das hohe Krächzen eines Vogels. Ulfar nickt wohlwollend.{/n} "Das ist ein Zeichen – das Schicksal begleitet uns. Skal!" {n}Der Wolf erhält sein Horn wieder zurück und nimmt einen gewaltigen Schluck.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Buruk sıvı, boğazını yakıyor. Görüşün aniden bir sisle gölgeleniyor. Gökyüzü kararıyor ve yükselen rüzgâr, kulaklarında uğulduyor. Rüzgâr, tiz bir şekilde gaklayan bir kuşun sesini taşıyor. Ulfar, onaylarmışçasına başını sallıyor.{/n} "Bu bir işaret, kader bizimle. Skal!" {n}Kurt, boynuzunu geri alıp içecekten kocaman bir yudum alıyor.{/n}

Skal!" {n}Taking back his horn, the Wolf takes a mighty swallow of the stuff.{/n}
